paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information specifically for the BRCA2 gene, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Among the BC patients positive for BRCA2- tumours, two were triple-negative BC (40%), one was Luminal B/HER2- (20%) and two were Luminal B/HER2+ (40%).

functional_data.summary: The specific functional data for BRCA2 variants was not detailed in the paper.

variants.additional_notes: Only one BRCA2 variant was mentioned in the context of pathogenicity.
key_quotes: Among the BC patients positive for BRCA2- tumours, two were triple-negative BC (40%), one was Luminal B/HER2- (20%) and two were Luminal B/HER2+ (40%).

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one BRCA2 variant was reported in the context of the study.
